page.title: 15HOUSING.
page.content: In Thurlby and Northorpe we have all kinds of Housing. Most of the new houses were built after 1960. The new houses are on two estates built in Northorpe. One estate has detached houses and bungalows.The other estate has detached houses. All of the bungalows and houses have garages, some have two. There are five thatched stone cottages and a few stone farm houses. All the rest are made of bricks with tile or slate roofs. One of the oldest cottages in Thurlby dates back to 1590. It is owned by our school caretaker. Fifty children were asked what kind of places they lived in. 24 in detached houses, 12 in bungalows, 6 in semi detached, 2 in cottages and 1 in a farm house.A lot of people like to live in Thurlby or Northorpe but travel to work each day by car.
